about_the_game: This is a RPG maker 2D interactive game with a plot and micro-puzzle. Players take the perspective of the protagonist, explore everything in their home at midnight, and get the truth after dawn. The story takes place in the 1990s, in a family with strong oriental cultural roots. The protagonist is a little girl who grows up under the care of her parents. Growth brings not only love, but also the awakening of her own consciousness of exploration and her understanding of the world. Knowledge, self-awareness in the current environment, the rise of one's own consciousness, driven by curiosity, and the exploration of daily affairs around, unlocking unfamiliar information, and in the end all answers will be obtained after dawn.

name: morning Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: window7(SP1+) and above
  • Processor: ×68 or ×86
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is a 2D game. Players operate the mouse, click to explore and obtain props, watch dialogue to advance the plot, and play the role of the protagonist alone in a house late at night, exploring daily and unfamiliar things, and unfolding the truth of her life.
